script.name: Power Mgmt Settings during WFH
script.notes:
• Turns Display Off after 15 minutes of idle time • Configures Computer Sleep settings to "Never" • Sets "Put Hard Disks to Sleep when possible" to "Off" • Wakes the system upon network acccess (e.g., remote access of some type) • Enables Startup automatically after a power failure • Turns on (or wakes) the system at 07:00 am Daily
2020-0319 by Becka Leyon, Daniel Montgomery, and Jamie Costa
